vote.title: Authorize the (1) Amendment No. 2 of the American Rescue Plan grant from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency through the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) (Contract No. 582-23-44419, Assistance Listing No. 66.034) to accept additional funding in the amount of $118,000.00, for replacement of aging equipment used by the City of Dallas to conduct ambient air monitoring, extending the term of the  TCEQ contract from August 31, 2026 to August 31, 2027; (2) increase of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $118,000.00 from $137,942.00 to $255,942.00 in the TCEQ FY23-24 American Rescue Plan Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $118,000.00 in the TCEQ FY23-24 American Rescue Plan Fund; and (4) execution of the contract with TCEQ and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $118,000.00 from $137,942.00 to $255,942.00 - Financing: TCEQ FY23-24 American Rescue Plan Fund
vote.description: Authorize the (1) Amendment No. 2 of the American Rescue Plan grant from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency through the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) (Contract No. 582-23-44419, Assistance Listing No. 66.034) to accept additional funding in the amount of $118,000.00, for replacement of aging equipment used by the City of Dallas to conduct ambient air monitoring, extending the term of the  TCEQ contract from August 31, 2026 to August 31, 2027; (2) increase of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $118,000.00 from $137,942.00 to $255,942.00 in the TCEQ FY23-24 American Rescue Plan Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $118,000.00 in the TCEQ FY23-24 American Rescue Plan Fund; and (4) execution of the contract with TCEQ and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $118,000.00 from $137,942.00 to $255,942.00 - Financing: TCEQ FY23-24 American Rescue Plan Fund
